content: Chamfer grinding hood DGH 130 3pk ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for grinders and sanders- ### FEATURES:Features Virtually dustless grinding Precise control of chamfer size – you can use an exchangeable clip-in guide for exact chamfering Robust – carbon-fiber-reinforced construction to withstand tough jobsite conditions Avoid chipped edges – use with a continuous rim cup wheel to reduce the risk of chipping the concrete Applications Grinding chamfers into concrete edges ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Dust extraction hoods Technical Data | Accessory type | Dust extraction hoods ### ITEMS- 2273029 - Chamfer grinding hood DGH 130 3pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x 0.5 INCH Adapter - 1x 1 INCH Adapter - 1x 0.75 INCH Adapter - 1x 1.5 INCH Adapter - 1x KONZEPT B 2 Base module - 1x KONZEPT B 1 Base module
